name: Sansnic's Hub in the modding and memes
name_original: Sansnic's Hub in the modding and memes
description:
So this is like my self insert mod that is inspired by mods like Zach's epic tutorials, Koopa fan's basics, Le baldi's guide thing and more out there

Story : so your Larry and Someone said you need to go to this stupid house for some papers since you needed more so you want in  the house and this guy named sansnic is in the house and you need to answer math problems. but don't worry its only 1 if you fail your going to have a bad time so be careful be careful as well with sansnic's friends may try to stop you

CREDITS

Missingtextureman101 - the founder of the answer 1 problem code

Cubemasterpro and others - inspired me to make this saga

Luis - How to change the story mode text in 1.4.3

Kintendoz - it's a bully role

Jaden - Playtime role

Siroofy90 - some music

thebaldimodder452 - the font

That's it for now I guess thank you youtubers who played my mods and I will see you next time.
